root.Summary: 1: Miyashita A, Hatsuta H, Kikuchi M, Nakaya A, Saito Y, Tsukie T, Hara N,Ogishima S, Kitamura N, Akazawa K, Kakita A, Takahashi H, Murayama S, Ihara Y,Ikeuchi T, Kuwano R; Japanese Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative.
